summary: This is a vampire overhaul that comes complete with five stages of vampirism, a Vampirism perk tree, and three specific roles to choose from in that perk tree.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img] http://img515.imageshack.us/img515/4311/sanguinarevampiris.png [/img][/center]
[center][img] http://img825.imageshack.us/img825/2198/overviewon.png [/img][/center]This is a vampire overhaul that comes complete with five stages of vampirism, a Vampirism perk tree, and three specific roles to choose from in that perk tree. You will be required to choose perks based on what kind of vampire you wish to be.
[color=red][list][*]Blood Path of the Savage: geared towards warrior type characters.
[*]Blood Path of the Dark Arts: geared towards mage type characters.
[*]Blood Path of the Night: geared towards thief/assassin type characters.[/list][/color]
The intention of this mod is to make vampires more fun, but also to maintain the feeling of a curse. Sunlight will make you very weak and you will only be able to choose between stat buffs for different skills. This is intended to keep vampires from becoming overpowered.
In order to add a new perk tree, I had to merge one with another. I decided to merge Pickpocketing with Lockpicking. You can now unlock all of the Pickpocketing perks through the Lockpicking perk tree. As a result of this Pickpocketing no longer levels any skills, but I think it is a worthwhile compromise.
This mod is very complete but it is also the first one I have made. If there are any bugs or issues whatsoever please feel free to let me know and I will work hard to get everything sorted out.

[center][img] http://img849.imageshack.us/img849/9603/perks.png [/img][/center]Initiate: 1 day as a vampire and 1 neck bitten.
[color=red][list][*]Vampiric Athletics: 5% faster movement Speed. Receive 50% less damage from falls.
[*]Vampiric Breathing: Unlimited water breathing duration.[/list][/color]
Fledgling: 10 days as a vampire and 5 necks bitten.
[color=red][list][*]+20 Health/Magicka/Stamina and +20% regeneration.[/list][/color]

[center][img] http://img542.imageshack.us/img542/6418/bloodpathsavage.png [/img][/center]Blood Path of the Savage: 20 days as a vampire and 10 necks bitten.
[color=red][list][*]+20% Melee damage.  +20 Health and +20% regeneration.[/list][/color]
Blood Fiend: 30 days as a vampire and 15 necks bitten.
[color=red][list][*]Your thirst for blood knows no bounds. You drink the blood of your fallen enemies to replenish your health. This also sets your vampirism to stage one.[/list][/color]
Athanasia: Requires: 40 days as a vampire and 20 necks bitten.
[color=red][list][*]Once a day, restores your Stamina if you fall below 20% health. Also fortifies melee and armor skills +20% for 60 seconds. This gives you a chance to defeat your enemies in combat.[/list][/color]
Phantasmal Percipience: 60 days as a vampire and 30 necks bitten.
[color=red][list][*]Melee attacks are 35% faster.[/list][/color]

[center][img] http://img196.imageshack.us/img196/7488/bloodpathdarkarts.png [/img][/center]Blood Path of the Dark Arts: 20 days as a vampire and 10 necks bitten.
[color=red][list][*]+20% Magicka and Magicka regeneration. +20% Illusion magic.[/list][/color]
Sortilege: 30 days as a vampire and 15 necks bitten.
[color=red][list][*]Your Alteration, Conjuration, Destruction, Illusion and Restoration spells are +10% stronger.[/list][/color]
Dark Temperament: 40 days as a vampire and 20 necks bitten.
[color=red][list][*]Once a day, use your willpower to overcome your enemies if your health drops below 20%. Your Magicka is restored and regenerates +100% faster. Also, +20% Alteration, Conjuration, Destruction and Illusion for 30 seconds. This gives you a chance to overcome your enemies with magic.[/list][/color]
Master of the Dark Arts: 60 days as a vampire and 30 necks bitten.
[color=red][list][*]+50 Magicka and +50% Magicka regeneration.[/list][/color]

[center][img] http://img42.imageshack.us/img42/7923/bloodpathnight.png [/img][/center]Blood Path of the Night: 20 days as a vampire and 10 necks bitten.
[color=red][list][*]+20% Sneak. +20 stamina and +20% regeneration.[/list][/color]
Praxis: 30 days as a vampire and 15 necks bitten.
[color=red][list][*]10% faster movement speed. Increased jump height and 50% less fall damage. (Stacks on Initiate perk.)[/list][/color]
Apparition: 40 days as a vampire and 20 necks bitten.
[color=red][list][*]Once a day when your health drops below 20%, you become formless to avoid death. Also, +20% Sneak and +100% Health Regeneration for 15 seconds. This gives you a chance to escape combat and find a place to hide to sneak attack your enemies.[/list][/color]
Shadow Walker: 60 days as a vampire and 30 necks bitten.
[color=red][list][*]As you blend into the shadows your movements cannot be heard. When sneaking, applies the visual effect for Ebony Mail and gives a constant muffle effect.[/list][/color]

[center][img] http://img207.imageshack.us/img207/322/vampireab.png [/img][/center]Vampiric Sight: Available during all stages.
[color=red][list][*]Has been made into a toggle ability.[/list][/color]
Vampiric Drain: Available during stages 3-5.
[color=red][list][*]Drain 10 Health from your target. Concentrated spell, costs 5 Magicka to cast.[/list][/color]
Vampiric Allure: Available during stages 3-5.
[color=red][list][*]Charm npc\'s up to level 40. This power can only be used once per day.[/list][/color]
Vampiric Servant: Available during stages 4-5.
[color=red][list][*]Reanimate a level 40 corpse to fight for you. This power has been given an unlimited duration. This power can only be used once per day.[/list][/color]
Embrace of Shadows. Available during stages 4-5.
[color=red][list][*]Become invisible for 2 minutes. This power can only be used once per day.[/list][/color]

[center][img] http://img35.imageshack.us/img35/1347/vampprog.png [/img][/center][center][u]Stage 1:[/u]
[color=red]Night:[/color]
No changes to Health/Magicka/Stamina.
No changes to Health/Magicka/Stamina regeneration.
Fire weakness 20%.
Frost resistance 100%.
[color=red]Day:[/color]
No changes to Health/Magicka/Stamina.
No changes to Health/Magicka/Stamina regeneration.
Fire weakness 40%.
Frost resistance 90%.

[u]Stage 2:[/u]
[color=red]Night:[/color]
-5 Health/Magicka/Stamina.
No changes to Health/Magicka/Stamina regeneration.
Fire weakness 40%.
Frost resistance 100%.
[color=red]Day:[/color]
-10 Health/Magicka/Stamina.
-100% Health/Magicka/Stamina regeneration.
Fire weakness 80%.
Frost resistance 80%.

[u]Stage 3:[/u]
[color=red]Night:[/color]
-10 Health/Magicka/Stamina.
No changes to Health/Magicka/Stamina regeneration.
Fire weakness 60%.
Frost resistance 100%.
[color=red]Day:[/color]
-25 Health/Magicka/Stamina.
-120% Health/Magicka/Stamina regeneration.
Fire weakness 120%.
Frost resistance 70%.

[u]Stage 4:[/u]
[color=red]Night:[/color]
-15 Health/Magicka/Stamina.
No changes to Health/Magicka/Stamina regeneration.
Fire weakness 80%.
Frost resistance 100%.
[color=red]Day:[/color]
-30 Health/Magicka/Stamina.
-120% Health/Magicka/Stamina regeneration.
Fire weakness 160%.
Frost resistance 60%.

[u]Stage 5:[/u]
[color=red]Night:[/color]
-20 Health/Magicka/Stamina.
No changes to Health/Magicka/Stamina regeneration.
Fire weakness 100%.
Frost resistance 100%.
[color=red]Day:[/color]
-40 Health/Magicka/Stamina.
-120% Health/Magicka/Stamina regeneration.
Fire weakness 200%.
Frost resistance 50%.[/center]

[center][img] http://img718.imageshack.us/img718/4081/futurep.png [/img][/center][list][*]I\'m interested in adding at least one more perk to each Blood Path. If anyone has any ideas please share them with me!
[*]I might restructure the way the Vampirism perk tree looks just to make it fit in more with the image, but I decided to wait and see if I add any more perks.
[*]The Lockpicking perk tree could be a little cleaner I guess, I might work on that in the future.
[*]Screenshots are still to come.
[*]Make this description page prettier.[/list]

[center][img] http://img600.imageshack.us/img600/5084/installn.png [/img][/center][list][*]First you will need to install ScriptDragon. This is used to control the jump height bonuses distributed by the perks. You can use the mod without ScriptDragon, but you won\'t be able to jump higher.
[*]You can get the latest version of ScriptDragon here: http://alexander.sannybuilder.com/?altname=skyrim_script_dragon
[*]Thanks to jimhsu for making the ScriptDragon plugin to control jump height! http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14437
[*]Once you have ScriptDragon installed you can either extract the contents of this archive to your \\skyrim\\data\\, or use NMM to install it automatically.
[*]This mod should probably be loaded somewhere near the bottom of your load order.[/list]

[center][img] http://img833.imageshack.us/img833/1548/compat.png [/img][/center][list][*]This mod will be incompatible with any mods that directly affects the vampire stages, the Pickpocket and Lockpicking perk trees. It also may not be compatible with mods that give the player perks in any other way than leveling up.
[*]Bottle That Blood - For Vampires by LFox. This mod has been tested and works with Sanguinare Vampiris.
[*]Werepyres - Vampire and Werewolf by MGoods. This mod has been tested and works with Sanguinare Vampiris.
[*]Better Vampire Sight and Night Eye by LloydChristoph. This mod has been tested and works with Sanguinare Vampiris and is pretty much a must have if using Realistic Lighting.
[*]Path of Shadows by Ronyn. If you want to be a sneaky vampire assassin, then use this mod along with mine. It adds a lot of perks and abilities that go very well with my mod, and more specifically if you follow the Bloof Path of the Night.
[*]If anyone has tested out any other mods that are compatible with this or are worth mentioning let me know and I will add them to the list.
[/list]
author: Dawei87

files.name: Sanguinare Vampiris
files.changelogHtml: Small fix for people who had trouble unlocking perks.
